summary: Created AI_BOT_SECTION_LAYOUT_FIX.md with instructions for fixing the AI Bot section layout in mobile/tablet. The issue is that the Glass Card should be on top and Pink Form should be at bottom. Need to swap order classes: Glass Card from order-1 to order-2, Pink Form from order-2 to order-1 for mobile/tablet only.
current_status: Documentation created for AI Bot section layout fix. Ready for implementation.
